name: Loan Calculator
description: Calculate loan EMI, interest, and payment schedules instantly with this user-friendly web-based calculator tool

name: Midnight Events
description: Dark-themed web application with sleek midnight aesthetics and modern user interface design elements.

name: Expense Tracker
description: Personal expense tracker to monitor daily spending, categorize transactions, and manage your budget effectively

name: Smile Selfie
description: Capture your smile & gestures with Smart Selfie

name: Whatsapp Lite
description: Direct peer-to-peer messaging platform enabling instant, server-free communication between users with enhanced privacy and low latency.

name: Note Cloud
description: Cloud-powered personal notebook app with Firebase backend, featuring rich text formatting, smart categorization, real-time sync.

name: Photo Editor
description: Advanced Photo Editor is a powerful, browser-based image editing application built with modern web technologies.

name: Light Bill Manager
description: Track Your Electricity Bills with node Web Power App. Summarize analyze.

name: Maintenance Tracker
description: Track and manage all your home maintenance tasks, bills, and repair schedules in one organized digital platform.

name: ChitChat P2P Call
description: A peer-to-peer video calling application built with WebRTC and Firebase. The app enables direct video communication between users with real-time signaling through Firebase Realtime Database.

name: Quick File Sharing
description: A modern web-based file sharing platform built with React and styled with Tailwind CSS. The application enables users to upload multiple files simultaneously, which are automatically packaged into a single ZIP archive and stored on Vercel Blob Storage.
